overview:
Wutyastudying is a free educational social networking web and iphone app that promotes student to student, and students to experts interaction on a variety of subjects ranging from General Biology to Venture Capital.

With student to student interaction, you can communicate with students at your school, across the nation, UK and Canada. The app allows you to form a dynamic study group or partner based on mastery level on different subjects. With the students to expertise interaction, it allows you to interact with experts in your network willing to share or trade some of their knowledge on different subject matters.

Stay in touch with all the cool and smart people you will meet.
